title: Problem
body:
Hi guys,

About 2 weeks ago I bought some RP and buy a champion skin. I see now on my account that skin is GONE along with another champion that I bought 1 month ago or something like that. Its like I never bought them. My question is wtf just happened and if you had the same problem, tell me what I need to do in order to take back the things that I gave money for. 

Thank you.

replies.body:
Since this is an issue specifically with your account, I recommend reaching out to our account specialists in a [support ticket.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)

Let me know if you have any questions.
